tourplans.day1: Arrival in Agra and check-in at the hotel. Visit Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and explore its fascinating Mughal architecture. Evening at leisure to explore local markets for handicrafts and souvenirs.
tourplans.day2: Early morning visit to the Taj Mahal to witness its beauty at sunrise. Enjoy a guided tour to learn about its history and significance. Return to the hotel for breakfast. Later, visit the Tomb of Itimad-ud-Daulah, also known as the Baby Taj, and Mehtab Bagh for sunset views of the Taj Mahal.
tourplans.day3: Take a half-day excursion to Fatehpur Sikri, the abandoned capital of the Mughal Empire, known for its impressive red sandstone architecture. Return to Agra for lunch. Spend the evening exploring local Mughlai cuisine before departure.
tourplans.day4: Check out from the hotel and transfer to the railway station or airport for departure with cherished memories of Agra.

a.name: Taj Mahal Splendor
a.description: Witness the epitome of love
a.description2: Visit the iconic Taj Mahal and explore Agra Fort and local markets for a cultural experience.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Paris and transfer to the hotel. Evening at leisure to explore the nearby streets and enjoy a welcome dinner at a local French restaurant.
tourplans.day2: Guided tour of iconic landmarks, including the Eiffel Tower, Champs-Élysées, and Arc de Triomphe. Afternoon visit to the Louvre Museum to admire world-famous artworks such as the Mona Lisa.
tourplans.day3: Explore the historic Montmartre district, including Sacré-Cœur Basilica. Enjoy a Seine River cruise to view the city from a unique perspective.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to the Palace of Versailles. Tour the opulent palace, magnificent gardens, and the Hall of Mirrors.
tourplans.day5: Discover the Latin Quarter and Notre-Dame Cathedral. Visit the Musée d'Orsay, known for its impressive collection of Impressionist art.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping, relaxation, or optional activities such as a cooking class or wine tasting.
tourplans.day7: Check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport for departure. Take home unforgettable memories of Paris.

a.name: Paris Gateway
a.description: Explore the romantic streets of Paris
a.description2: Visit iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and enjoy the city's charming cafes.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Tokyo and transfer to the hotel. Evening at leisure to explore nearby Shinjuku streets.
tourplans.day2: Guided tour of Tokyo Tower, Senso-ji Temple, and Nakamise Street. Experience traditional tea ceremonies.
tourplans.day3: Visit the Meiji Shrine and stroll through Yoyogi Park. Explore Harajuku's trendy shops and cafes.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Mount Fuji and Hakone. Enjoy scenic views and a relaxing hot spring experience.
tourplans.day5: Explore Akihabara for electronics and anime culture. Visit the Edo-Tokyo Museum for historical insights.
tourplans.day6: Enjoy a guided sushi-making class. Free afternoon for shopping in Ginza.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport for departure. Sayonara, Tokyo!

a.name: Tokyo Adventure
a.description: Immerse yourself in the bustling metropolis of Tokyo
a.description2: Experience traditional temples, visit modern districts like Shibuya, and enjoy sushi and shopping.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Rome and transfer to the hotel. Evening at leisure to enjoy authentic Italian pizza.
tourplans.day2: Guided tour of the Colosseum and Roman Forum, discovering ancient Rome's history.
tourplans.day3: Visit the Vatican City, including St. Peter's Basilica, the Vatican Museums, and the Sistine Chapel.
tourplans.day4: Explore the charming Trastevere district and visit the Pantheon and Piazza Navona.
tourplans.day5: Day trip to Tivoli, featuring Villa d'Este and Villa Adriana, UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
tourplans.day6: Free day for exploring, shopping, or enjoying a cooking class to make pasta.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport for departure. Arrivederci, Rome!

a.name: Rome Highlights
a.description: Walk through the history of ancient Rome
a.description2: Visit the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Vatican City, and savor traditional Italian food.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in New York City and transfer to the hotel. Evening walk through Times Square.
tourplans.day2: Explore Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, and the American Museum of Natural History.
tourplans.day3: Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island. Take a walking tour of Wall Street and the 9/11 Memorial.
tourplans.day4: Stroll through the High Line and Chelsea Market. Enjoy an evening Broadway show.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center. Spend the afternoon exploring SoHo and Chinatown.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping on Fifth Avenue or visiting the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA).
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Say goodbye to the Big Apple.

a.name: New York City Vibes
a.description: Experience the energy of New York City
a.description2: See Times Square, Central Park, Broadway shows, and taste local delicacies.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Sydney and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll along the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
tourplans.day2: Explore the Sydney Opera House and the Royal Botanic Garden.
tourplans.day3: Visit the Sydney Tower Eye for panoramic views and the Sydney Aquarium.
tourplans.day4: Take a ferry to Manly Beach and explore the local markets.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Blue Mountains and explore the Three Sisters and Echo Point.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping or relaxing on Bondi Beach.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport for departure. Farewell, Sydney!

a.name: Sydney Escapade
a.description: Explore the stunning beauty of Sydney
a.description2: See the Sydney Opera House, Bondi Beach, and explore local markets and restaurants.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Bali and transfer to the hotel. Relax at the beach or explore the local markets.
tourplans.day2: Visit the Uluwatu Temple and explore the beautiful beaches of Bali.
tourplans.day3: Explore the Tegalalang Rice Terraces and visit the Monkey Forest.
tourplans.day4: Take a day trip to the Gili Islands and enjoy the crystal-clear waters.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Tanah Lot Temple and explore the local art and handicrafts.
tourplans.day6: Free day for relaxation or exploring the local markets.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport for departure. Farewell, Bali!

a.name: Bali Getaway
a.description: Relax and unwind in Bali
a.description2: Enjoy Bali lush landscapes, tranquil beaches, and vibrant culture, perfect for relaxation or adventure.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in London and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll along the Thames and dinner at a classic British pub.
tourplans.day2: Visit iconic landmarks like Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and Westminster Abbey. Afternoon tour of the British Museum.
tourplans.day3: Explore the Tower of London and Tower Bridge. Take a ride on the London Eye for breathtaking views of the city.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Bath, experiencing England's rich history and culture.
tourplans.day5: Discover Camden Market and Regent's Park. Enjoy a West End theater performance in the evening.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping on Oxford Street or visiting the National Gallery and Trafalgar Square.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Take home lasting memories of London.

a.name: London Discovery
a.description: Explore the charm of London
a.description2: Discover London's iconic landmarks like the Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, and the British Museum, blending history and modernity.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Dubai and transfer to the hotel. Evening visit to the Dubai Fountain and Dubai Mall.
tourplans.day2: Explore the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world, and visit the Dubai Aquarium.
tourplans.day3: Take a desert safari with dune bashing, camel riding, and a Bedouin-style dinner.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Abu Dhabi, including the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque and Louvre Abu Dhabi.
tourplans.day5: Visit Palm Jumeirah and Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark. Evening at leisure          on JBR Walk.
tourplans.day6: Free day for luxury shopping or relaxing at a private beach.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Farewell, Dubai!

a.name: Dubai Adventure
a.description: Discover the wonders of Dubai
a.description2: Explore Dubai's stunning architecture, world-class shopping, and exciting attractions like the Burj Khalifa and Desert Safari.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Amsterdam and transfer to the hotel. Evening canal cruise and dinner at a local restaurant.
tourplans.day2: Visit the Anne Frank House and explore the Van Gogh Museum.
tourplans.day3: Explore the Jordaan neighborhood and take a canal cruise.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Giethoorn, a picturesque village with canals.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Rijksmuseum and explore the Red Light District.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping or exploring the city's museums.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Farewell, Amsterdam!

a.name: Amsterdam Vibes
a.description: Experience the beauty of Amsterdam
a.description2: Take a canal cruise through Amsterdam, visit the Anne Frank House, and enjoy the city's art museums and vibrant nightlife.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Malé and transfer to your resort via speedboat or seaplane. Relaxation on pristine beaches.
tourplans.day2: Explore the coral reefs with snorkeling or diving. Evening sunset cruise with dolphin spotting.
tourplans.day3: Indulge in water sports such as jet skiing or paddleboarding. Afternoon leisure by the infinity pool.
tourplans.day4: Island-hopping tour to explore local villages and uninhabited islands.
tourplans.day5: Relax with a spa treatment or enjoy a private beach dinner under the stars.
tourplans.day6: Free day for relaxation or optional activities like fishing or yoga sessions.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to Malé for departure. Farewell, Maldives paradise!

a.name: Maldives Retreat
a.description: A paradise for relaxation and adventure
a.description2: Enjoy turquoise waters, white sandy beaches, and luxury overwater villas in the Maldives.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Singapore and transfer to the hotel. Evening visit to Marina Bay Sands and the Spectra light show.
tourplans.day2: Explore Gardens by the Bay, including the Cloud Forest and Flower Dome. Visit the Supertree Grove in the evening.
tourplans.day3: Day trip to Sentosa Island to enjoy Universal Studios, S.E.A. Aquarium, and beaches.
tourplans.day4: Discover Chinatown, Little India, and Kampong Glam. Visit the iconic Merlion Park in the afternoon.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Singapore Zoo and take the River Safari. Evening stroll along Clarke Quay.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping on Orchard Road or optional activities like a food tour.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Take home unforgettable memories of Singapore.

a.name: Singapore Splendor
a.description: A futuristic and cultural hub
a.description2: Visit Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, and enjoy diverse cuisines in Singapore.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Istanbul and transfer to the hotel. Evening walk along the Bosphorus and dinner at a rooftop restaurant.
tourplans.day2: Explore the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, and Topkapi Palace. Visit the Basilica Cistern.
tourplans.day3: Take a Bosphorus cruise and visit Dolmabahçe Palace. Enjoy shopping at the Grand Bazaar.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Princes’ Islands for a relaxing day with stunning views and historical sites.
tourplans.day5: Visit the Spice Bazaar and explore the vibrant Taksim Square and Istiklal Street.
tourplans.day6: Free day for relaxing at a hammam or optional activities like a Turkish cooking class.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Goodbye, Istanbul!

a.name: Istanbul Odyssey
a.description: Where East meets West
a.description2: Discover the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and the bustling Grand Bazaar in Istanbul.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Barcelona and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll along Las Ramblas and dinner at a tapas bar.
tourplans.day2: Visit the iconic Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and Casa Batlló. Afternoon walk in the Gothic Quarter.
tourplans.day3: Explore Montjuïc Hill, including the Magic Fountain and National Art Museum of Catalonia.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Montserrat to see the Benedictine Monastery and enjoy stunning views.
tourplans.day5: Discover Barceloneta Beach and the Picasso Museum. Evening at the Port Vell waterfront.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping at Passeig de Gràcia or optional activities like a Flamenco show.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Adiós, Barcelona!

a.name: Barcelona Fiesta
a.description: A city of art, architecture, and beaches
a.description2: Marvel at Gaudi's creations, explore Gothic quarters, and relax by the Mediterranean.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Kyoto and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll in the Gion district to spot geishas.
tourplans.day2: Visit the Golden Pavilion (Kinkaku-ji), Ryoan-ji Temple, and Nijo Castle.
tourplans.day3: Explore the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove and Togetsukyo Bridge. Afternoon visit to the Iwatayama Monkey Park.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Nara to see Todai-ji Temple, Nara Park, and Kasuga Taisha Shrine.
tourplans.day5: Discover Fushimi Inari Shrine and its iconic torii gates. Afternoon at the Philosopher's Path.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping or optional activities like a traditional tea ceremony experience.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Farewell, Kyoto!

a.name: Kyoto Serenity
a.description: A journey through Japan's cultural heart
a.description2: Experience Kyoto's tranquil temples, stunning gardens, and traditional tea ceremonies.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Vancouver and transfer to the hotel. Evening walk along the waterfront and Gastown.
tourplans.day2: Visit Stanley Park, including the seawall and totem poles. Afternoon at Granville Island Market.
tourplans.day3: Explore Grouse Mountain and Capilano Suspension Bridge Park for stunning views and nature trails.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Whistler for adventure sports or scenic sightseeing.
tourplans.day5: Discover Vancouver Aquarium and Science World. Evening at English Bay Beach.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping at Robson Street or optional activities like a whale-watching tour.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Take home memories of beautiful Vancouver.

a.name: Vancouver Escape
a.description: Nature and urban adventure in Canada
a.description2: Explore Vancouver's Stanley Park, Capilano Suspension Bridge, and vibrant city life.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Los Angeles and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll along the Santa Monica Pier and beach.
tourplans.day2: Explore Hollywood, including the Walk of Fame, TCL Chinese Theatre, and Griffith Observatory.
tourplans.day3: Visit Universal Studios for thrilling rides and behind-the-scenes experiences.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Disneyland for a magical adventure in the 'Happiest Place on Earth.'
tourplans.day5: Discover Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive. Afternoon at the Getty Center for art and architecture.
tourplans.day6: Relax at Venice Beach or take an optional whale-watching tour.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Farewell, Los Angeles!

a.name: Los Angeles Dreams
a.description: Experience the glitz and glamour of LA
a.description2: Visit Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, and Universal Studios in Los Angeles.

tourplans.day1: Arrival          in Florence and transfer to the hotel. Evening walk to the Piazzale Michelangelo for panoramic views of the city.
tourplans.day2: Explore the Uffizi Gallery and Accademia Gallery to admire Renaissance masterpieces, including Michelangelo's David.
tourplans.day3: Visit the Florence Cathedral, Baptistery, and Giotto's Campanile. Afternoon at the Boboli Gardens.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to Pisa to see the Leaning Tower and explore its historic city center.
tourplans.day5: Discover the vibrant markets of Florence, including Mercato Centrale. Evening stroll along the Ponte Vecchio.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping or optional activities like a Tuscan wine-tasting tour.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Arrivederci, Florence!

a.name: Florence Art Tour
a.description: Discover the Renaissance in Florence
a.description2: Explore Florence's iconic landmarks like the Uffizi Gallery, Florence Cathedral, and Ponte Vecchio.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Phuket and transfer to the resort. Evening relaxation at the beach and a seafood dinner.
tourplans.day2: Visit Big Buddha and Wat Chalong Temple. Afternoon at Patong Beach for water sports and nightlife.
tourplans.day3: Island-hopping tour to Phi Phi Islands, with snorkeling and stunning views of Maya Bay.
tourplans.day4: Explore Phang Nga Bay and James Bond Island by boat.
tourplans.day5: Relax at Kata or Karon Beach. Afternoon visit to the Old Phuket Town for cultural exploration.
tourplans.day6: Free day for spa treatments, shopping, or optional activities like scuba diving.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Goodbye, Phuket!

a.name: Phuket Paradise
a.description: Tropical getaway in Thailand
a.description2: Relax on pristine beaches, enjoy vibrant nightlife, and explore island excursions in Phuket.

tourplans.day1: Arrival in Seoul and transfer to the hotel. Evening stroll along Cheonggyecheon Stream and dinner at a local Korean BBQ restaurant.
tourplans.day2: Visit Gyeongbokgung Palace, Bukchon Hanok Village, and the National Museum of Korea.
tourplans.day3: Explore N Seoul Tower and Myeongdong for shopping and street food.
tourplans.day4: Day trip to the DMZ to learn about Korea's history and experience the Third Tunnel.
tourplans.day5: Visit Changdeokgung Palace and its Secret Garden. Afternoon at Insadong for traditional crafts and tea houses.
tourplans.day6: Free day for shopping in Gangnam or optional activities like a K-pop tour.
tourplans.day7: Check out and transfer to the airport. Farewell, Seoul!

a.name: Seoul City Highlights
a.description: Discover the heart of South Korea
a.description2: Experience the vibrant city of Seoul by visiting Gyeongbokgung Palace, Bukchon Hanok Village, N Seoul Tower, and the bustling streets of Myeongdong for shopping and street food.

a.name: Bangalore
a.description: v
a.description2: s
